name: ListIssueComments
description:
Fetch comments for all issues in a repository.

Use this tool to retrieve all comments from issues in a specified GitHub repository. Comments are ordered by ascending ID.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository, not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: sort_property
parameters.description: The property to sort the issue comments by. Use 'created' for when the repo was starred or 'updated' for last push.

value_schema.description: The property to sort the results by. `created` means when the repository was starred. `updated` means when the repository was last pushed to.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sets the sorting order, `asc` for ascending or `desc` for descending, used with `sort`.

value_schema.description: Either `asc` or `desc`. Ignored without the `sort` parameter.

parameters.name: updated_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Filter comments updated after this timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to display per page, up to a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: The page number of results to fetch for issue comments in a repository.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
